title: Patch Notes
content: Raphael by the Thorm Mausoleum. Fixed a camera and mocap pop on Jaheira at Moonrise Towers after the combat in the Colony. Avatar Karlach now says 'Edict of Bane' instead of 'Lash of Bane' when referencing Gortash in the Colony. Fixed Art Cullagh floating onto the bed when you speak to him a second time.
